rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 37 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:32 AM, 11 July 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Tarlac, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas, Rizal, Laguna and Nueva Ecija within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Bataan and Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, San Marcelino, Subic) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
